properties.areaDesc: Monroe, IN; Morgan, IN; Owen, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:09AM EST until January 16 at 12:27PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

Big Blue River...Driftwood River...Eagle Creek...East Fork White
River...Eel River...Flatrock River...Mill Creek...Mississinewa
River...Sugar Creek...Tippecanoe River...Wabash River...White
River...Wildcat Creek...Youngs Creek...


.With rainfall totals between 1 to 2 inches there are
widespread flooding concerns across much of Indiana. Over the next
couple of days we will see another 1 to 3 inches of rain or more
possible.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant.
* from Saturday afternoon to Thursday afternoon.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 603.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It is forecast to rise above flood stage Saturday
afternoon, crest at 607.2 feet Sunday evening, and then fall below
flood stage by late Wednesday night.
* At 607.0 feet...Extensive flooding of agricultural lands.  Blue
Bluff and Paragon Roads are impassable.  Flood waters affect a few
homes in Waverly.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
